title: ‘Nobody Likes It’: Tour de France Femmes Peloton Reacts to ‘Hellish’ Split Stage 2 and 3
content:
Missing team buses at end of stage 2 cause frustration, as riders sound off on throwback day and insiders lift lid on logistics of the Tour’s longest day.

Read the full article at ‘Nobody Likes It’: Tour de France Femmes Peloton Reacts to ‘Hellish’ Split Stage 2 and 3 on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
